Women.name: Classic Bangle
Women.desc: A masterclass in minimalist jewelry. This handcrafted bangle features a slender, polished profile designed to catch the light subtly. Perfect for stacking or wearing as a single statement piece to elevate your everyday ensemble.

Women.name: Signature Cap
Women.desc: Constructed from premium washed cotton for a lived-in feel from the very first wear. This essential cap features an adjustable strap and a breathable crown, making it the perfect companion for sunny morning walks or casual weekend outings.

Women.name: Floral Summer Dress
Women.desc: Embrace the warmth of the season in this lightweight linen-blend dress. Featuring a delicate hand-painted floral motif and a flowy silhouette, it offers a breezy, effortless fit that transitions beautifully from a garden brunch to a seaside sunset.

Women.name: Evening Silk Dress
Women.desc: Lustrous and sophisticated, this evening gown is cut from heavy-weight mulberry silk that drapes elegantly against the body. With its subtle sheen and timeless cut, it is designed for those special occasions where quiet luxury speaks volumes.

Women.name: Casual Day Dress
Women.desc: The ultimate everyday uniform. Crafted from ultra-soft organic cotton jersey, this dress provides maximum comfort without sacrificing style. Its relaxed fit and durable construction make it a reliable staple for the modern woman on the go.

Women.name: Gold Hoop Earrings
Women.desc: Timeless elegance for your jewelry box. These 14k gold-plated hoops feature a lightweight hollow core for all-day comfort. Their classic diameter makes them versatile enough to pair with a white tee or a sophisticated evening blazer.

Women.name: Tailored Trousers
Women.desc: Precision-engineered for a flawless silhouette. These high-waisted trousers are made from a wrinkle-resistant wool blend with sharp pressed pleats. They offer a structured look that commands respect in the boardroom and elegance at dinner.

Women.name: Essential Button-Down
Women.desc: A crisp, clean foundation for any wardrobe. This shirt is woven from high-thread-count organic cotton, offering a breathable yet structured feel. Wear it tucked for a professional look or oversized for a relaxed, borrowed-from-the-boys aesthetic.

Men.name: Utility Messenger Bag
Men.desc: Built for the urban commuter, this bag is crafted from water-repellent heavy canvas with reinforced leather stress points. It features an internal padded sleeve for laptops and multiple quick-access pockets for your daily essentials.

Men.name: Leather Weekender
Men.desc: The perfect companion for short escapes. This spacious bag is made from top-grain pebbled leather that develops a beautiful patina over time. Includes a detachable shoulder strap and dedicated compartments for shoes and travel documents.

Men.name: Classic Wool Hat
Men.desc: Knitted from a premium merino wool blend, this beanie offers exceptional warmth without the itch. Its classic ribbed texture and adjustable cuff provide a snug fit that keeps you insulated during the coldest winter months.

Men.name: Oxford Button-Down
Men.desc: The quintessential smart-casual shirt. Made from traditional oxford cloth with a subtle texture, this piece features a button-down collar and a tailored fit. It’s durable enough for daily wear and sharp enough for any social calendar.

Men.name: Linen Summer Shirt
Men.desc: Stay cool when the temperature rises. This shirt is made from 100% sustainably sourced linen, known for its incredible breathability and moisture-wicking properties. Its relaxed drape and natural texture embody the spirit of vacation.

Men.name: Casual Flannel
Men.desc: A rugged staple for the cooler seasons. Our flannel is double-brushed for an incredibly soft hand-feel and extra insulation. Featuring a classic plaid pattern, it works perfectly as a standalone shirt or layered over a clean white tee.

Men.name: Crewneck Tee
Men.desc: Not your average t-shirt. Constructed from a heavyweight 250gsm cotton, this tee features a reinforced collar that won't lose its shape. It’s a durable, high-quality essential designed to be the backbone of your wardrobe for years.

Men.name: Quilted Vest
Men.desc: The ultimate layering piece for transitional weather. This vest features a lightweight diamond-quilted shell with synthetic insulation and a water-resistant finish. It provides core warmth without adding bulk, making it ideal for active outdoor use.

Men.name: Slim Fit Chinos
Men.desc: A versatile bridge between denim and formal trousers. These chinos are made from a stretch-cotton twill that moves with you. With a modern slim-tapered leg and a soft-touch finish, they are as comfortable as they are polished.

articles.title: Summer Essentials for Her
articles.excerpt: A quiet manifesto on the beauty of slow living and intentional curation. We explore why Velina exists—not just to sell beautiful things, but to encourage a lifestyle of quality over quantity.

articles.title: How to Style Minimal Accessories
articles.excerpt: A capsule wardrobe isn't about restriction; it's about clarity. It's a quiet rebellion against overconsumption. Learn how to let your personality shine through a few perfectly chosen pieces.

articles.title: Wardrobe Staples That Last
articles.excerpt: In a world dominated by fast fashion and fleeting trends, we often forget the power of a well-made garment. Discover the textiles and techniques that ensure your favorite pieces stay in rotation for years.
